basics.name: Andrés Zambrano
basics.label: Electronics and Telecommunications Engineer - Security Information Specialist
basics.summary: Extensive experience in team leadership, operational and logistical process management, and technical support in the financial and telecommunications sectors. Focused on coordination, supervision, diagnostics, maintenance, and information security under agile methodologies. Experience in cybersecurity compliance, vendor management, and service indicator improvement.

work.name: Ministry of Information and Communications Technology MinTIC
work.summary: Led feasibility studies on electrical and telecommunications infrastructure in rural communities. Achieved 90% coverage of assigned communities, meeting connectivity goals. Prepared technical reports and feasibility analyses for the Ministry. Conducted training and awareness programs on technology and connectivity. Utilized geolocation tools and generated .KML files for network design.

work.name: A Toda Hora S.A - AVC
work.summary: Coordinated and audited telecom and physical security infrastructure providers. Installed and configured CISCO routers, RAVEN Sierra, and VSAT Cable-modems. Diagnosed and maintained ATM hardware (Hyosung, Diebold, Wincor). Implemented and supported CCTV systems with EUDOX DVRs and IDIS NVRs. Achieved 96% compliance with SLAs and outstanding evaluation scores.

work.name: A Toda Hora S.A - AVC
work.summary: Supervised preventive and corrective maintenance of ATMs. Managed a regional team of 10 members, ensuring KPI and SLA compliance. Led ATM restoration in conflict-affected areas of Buenaventura. Controlled financial and logistical resources. Received excellent feedback from national managers.

work.name: Aladdin Hotel and Casinos S.A.S
work.summary: Diagnosed, installed, and repaired electronic entertainment and self-service systems. Provided second- and third-line repair support, including part replacements for bill validators, coin acceptors, thermal printers, LCD monitors, CRT monitors, specialized boards, electromechanical devices, mechatronic devices, animatronic devices, luminous devices, underfloor and overhead electrical wiring, bill and coin counters, keyboards, and joysticks. Achieved outstanding performance in repairs within the first month, earning access to casinos and workshops simultaneously. Assigned as an on-site electronic support technician in a casino, managing inventory, stock control, quality control, and on-site testing. Used manual tools, electronic measuring instruments, and interpreted electrical and electronic schematics.

work.name: Credibanco
work.position: Payment Devices and Media Access Technician
work.summary: Led payment device reprogramming with an 8-person team. Trained VIP merchants (Falabella, La 14, Cencosud, Price Smart) on payment devices. Provided first- and second-line technical support for POS terminals (Verifone, Spectra, Ingenico). Designed a technical support and service manual. Managed encryption keys for POS terminals (3 DES - Master Key).

projects.name: Design of an Automatic System for the Detection and Identification of Patients Attending Therapy at Biomedical Group, San Fernando Branch, in the City of Cali.
projects.summary: Outlines the stages involved in designing a custom patient detection and identification system, detailing from system characterization to the development of a functional demo. A solution is presented based on a local network comprising five WI-FI technology routers, with the measurement of their respective RSSI through Android devices. The solution is oriented towards indoor location. Additionally, a virtual machine is implemented to act as the server for processing information. Within the server processing stage, a neural network implemented using Tensor Flow in Python is hosted. This neural network is responsible for generating location predictions and facilitating interconnection with other processing stages of the system. The presented system's functionalities include patient registration through interaction with an Android application that communicates with the server. Various processing stages are carried out through PHP files, which handle requests to the MongoDB-implemented database. The system encompasses automatic detection and identification of patients upon their arrival at the clinic, prediction, and automatic recording of their movements, alongside the calculation of durations in each clinic area until their departure. Recorded data can be visualized through a Power BI-implemented dashboard.
